prompts: Create a graceful pony Pokemon that has a flowing mane and sparkles in sunlight.
Imagine a horse-like Pokemon with a fiery tail and vibrant colors that dance in the wind.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and elegance, with pastel colors and a shimmering coat.
Show me a mythical creature resembling a pony, with a rainbow-colored mane and magical abilities.
Give me a cute Pokemon that has fluffy hair and can trot gracefully through grassy fields.
Make a legendary Pokemon that roams the mountains, with dazzling colors and a powerful presence.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon inspired by fairytales, featuring a unique blend of soft and bright colors.
